import React from 'react' import './cart-item.styles.scss' import {deleteOneItem} from '../../redux/cart/car.action' import {connect} from 'react-redux' const CartItem = ({ item: { imageUrl, price, name, quantity }, deleteOneItem }) => { return
{name} {quantity} x ${price}
X
} const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ deleteOneItem: () => dispatch(deleteOneItem()) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CartItem);
